column2: "That was epic, <%me>! I watched the whole thing on the monitor!"
"Oh, right, I already said that. But I really meant it, so don't be surprised if I keep repeating myself!"
"Anyway, you were dead on when you decided to smack it down right there."
"I felt like I could have done it...! Eh, you're so damn cool, you won't let me!"
